text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: CodeSystem type-profile-style

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/type-profile-style defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
fhir FHIRFHIR profiling using profiles specified by the context, or as specified in Resource.meta.profile. This is the default if nothing else is specified
cda CDAType Profiles are applied using templateId

name: TypeProfileStylesCS
title: Type Profile Style Codes
description: How the data type is bound to vocabulary

concept.definition: FHIR profiling using profiles specified by the context, or as specified in Resource.meta.profile. This is the default if nothing else is specified
Type Profiles are applied using templateId
